Name: Reflex
About the game: You need to solve puzzles. Destroy all shapes. If you cant pass level just click on hint button. Click on screen to open menu and choose levels. Hold mouse button and try to destroy shapes after that will be next level. There are 70 levels that will more difficult than previous one Game Features : Addictive levels Simple Graphics Use hint to clear the Levels More than 70+ levels Easy achievements Custom achievements
